scripts.run:dev: pm2 flush && yarn pm2:stop && pm2 flush && NODE_ENV=development pm2 start src/server/server.js --watch "src/server" --node-args="--inspect=5858" --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSSS Z" && clear && pm2 list && pm2 logs --lines 1000
scripts.run:dev-cluster: pm2 flush && yarn pm2:stop && pm2 flush && NODE_ENV=development pm2 start src/server/server.js -i 0 --watch "src/server" --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSSS Z" && clear && pm2 list && pm2 logs --lines 1000
scripts.run:prod: pm2 flush && yarn pm2:stop && pm2 flush && yarn build && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start src/server/server.js --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSSS Z" && clear && pm2 list && pm2 logs --lines 1000
scripts.run:prod-cluster: pm2 flush && yarn pm2:stop && pm2 flush && yarn build && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start src/server/server.js -i 0 --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSSS Z" && clear && pm2 list && pm2 logs --lines 1000
scripts.pm2:update: yarn global add pm2@latest && pm2 update
scripts.remove:all: yarn remove:build && yarn remove:packages && yarn remove:coverage && yarn remove:snapshots
scripts.install:prod: yarn add express serve-favicon react react-dom fs-extra chalk
scripts.install:dev: yarn add --dev stylelint eslint eslint-plugin-react babel-eslint eslint-config-prettier babel-preset-env babel-preset-react babel-preset-stage-2 webpack webpack-dev-middleware webpack-hot-middleware babel-loader react-hot-loader@next file-loader url-loader style-loader css-loader postcss-loader precss html-webpack-plugin extract-text-webpack-plugin webpack-chunk-hash webpack-manifest-plugin chunk-manifest-webpack-plugin jest babel-jest identity-obj-proxy
scripts.install:all: yarn install:global && yarn install:prod && yarn install:dev
